byline.contributor: Logan Hickman contributed reporting from Columbus, Ohio.

abstract: Abdirahman Sheik Mohamud, naturalized American citizen who trained with Islamic militants in Syria, is indicted on federal charges of supporting terrorism; prosecutors say Mohamud returned to United States with goal of mounting attack at home.
lead_paragraph: Officials said that the man, Abdirahman Sheik Mohamud, 23, a naturalized American citizen who trained with a terrorist group in Syria, spoke of wanting to attack a military facility or a prison in the United States.

headline.main: Ohio Man Trained in Syria Is Charged With Planning Terrorism in U.S.
headline.print_headline: Ohio Man Is Accused of Terror Attack Goal

snippet: Officials said that the man, Abdirahman Sheik Mohamud, 23, a naturalized American citizen who trained with a terrorist group in Syria, spoke of wanting to attack a military facility or a prison in the United States.

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations
